params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The channel for which to execute the request. The format is projects/[PROJECT_ID]/notificationChannels/[CHANNEL_ID].

params.name: data.force
params.description: If true, the notification channel will be deleted regardless of its use in alert policies (the policies will be updated to remove the channel). If false, channels that are still referenced by an existing alerting policy will fail to be deleted in a delete operation.
